dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: YOU DARE TO ENTER MY REALM, PUNY MORTAL?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, mighty Balrug. I seek your wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Hah! Weaklings like you don't deserve it. What boon do you offer me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer to leave your realm and never return.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave and never return? You insult me! Prepare to face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I beg for mercy, I will leave at once.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your pleas fall on deaf ears. Prepare for your demise, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand and face you, foul creature!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words for one facing doom. Let the battle begin!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer to challenge you in a test of strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A test of strength? Interesting. Very well, prove your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield, you are too powerful.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. You may leave unharmed, for now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I emerge victorious, what say you now?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impressive. I shall spare you this time, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no boon to offer, I seek only passage through your realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No boon? Pathetic. You shall not pass without a price.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will pay the price, just let me through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your payment is accepted. Pass quickly and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to pay, I will find another way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool. You shall not leave here alive.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come to challenge your rule, Infernal Warlord. Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge my rule? Bold words, mortal. Face the consequences of your foolishness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not afraid of you, I will defeat you!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defeat me? Hah! You will beg for mercy before the end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield, spare me and I will leave your realm forever.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice will not save you now. Prepare for your demise!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight until my last breath, prepare for a true challenge!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish bravery. Let the battle decide your fate!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my words, I seek to make amends.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies? They mean nothing to me. What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek forgiveness, I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure is all I desire. Leave now and never return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to join forces with you, mighty Balrug.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? Interesting proposition. Very well, we shall ally.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a duel to prove my strength!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A duel, you say? Very well, let us test your mettle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield, you are a formidable opponent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave now and do not cross paths with me again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I emerge victorious, will you accept defeat?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impressive. I acknowledge your strength. We shall part ways.
